p: Effective cure in the form of vaccine or therapeutic drug is the need of hour to control the COVID-19 from infecting more people. Many vaccine candidates for COVID-19 are in preclinical stage ( https://www.who.int/blueprint/priority-diseases/key-action/novel-coronavirus-landscape-ncov.pdf?ua=1). The vaccine candidate developed against SARS-CoV should be evaluated against COVID-19 virus for its efficacy in inducing neutralizing antibodies as there is similarity with respect to spike protein.
